text: Maria Teresa (born María Teresa Mestre y Batista; 22 March 1956) is the spouse of Henri, Grand Duke of Luxembourg, who acceded to the throne in 2000. She was born in Cuba. Maria Teresa married Prince Henri of Luxembourg in a civil ceremony on 4 February 1981 and a religious ceremony on 14 February 1981. She received a bouquet of red roses as a wedding gift from the then Cuban dictator Fidel Castro. The couple has five children: Guillaume, Hereditary Grand Duke of Luxembourg, Prince Félix of Luxembourg, Prince Louis of Luxembourg, Princess Alexandra of Luxembourg, and Prince Sébastien of Luxembourg. ==Titles and styles== *14 February 1981 – 7 October 2000: Her Royal Highness The Hereditary Grand Duchess of Luxembourg, Princess of Nassau, Princess of Bourbon-Parma *7 October 2000: Her Royal Highness The Grand Duchess of Luxembourg, Princess of Nassau, Princess of Bourbon-Parma ==Other websites== *Official website of H.R.H Maria Teresa, Grand Duchess of Luxembourg *Official website *The Mentor Foundation charity website Category:1956 births Category:Living people Category:People from Havana Category:Luxembourgian princes and princesses
title: Maria Teresa, Grand Duchess of Luxembourg
